amendment.description: Amendment provides for transparent accounting of the costs of litigation by requiring the Comptroller General of the United States to issue quarterly reports to the House and Senate Judiciary Committees on the costs of civil actions, including any attorney fees, brought pursuant to this Act.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 4 printed in Part A of House Report 113-378 to provide for transparent accounting of the costs of litigation, by requiring the Comptroller General of the United States to issue quarterly reports to the House and Senate Judiciary Committees on the costs of civil actions, including any attorney fees, brought pursuant to this Act.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Cicilline amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.
